channel.title: 5.12 series on Fsu0413's Original Qt builds
channel.description: Recent content in 5.12 series on Fsu0413's Original Qt builds

item.title: 5.12.12 for macOS
item.description: Important FINAL VERSION, NO MORE UPDATES EVEN IF REQUESTED, BUILD ENVIRONMENT HAS BEEN DESTRUCTED Note SQLite (distributed with Qt) are built in the package using -sql-sqlite Note All builds have -no-openssl -securetransport. It means that we are using Secure Transport library of macOS to provide SSL connections. Note All builds have -no-icu because I think the ICU library is too big and, in most of the conditions, useless for common users.

item.title: 5.12.12 for WebAssembly
item.description: Important FINAL VERSION, NO MORE UPDATES EVEN IF REQUESTED, BUILD ENVIRONMENT HAS BEEN DESTRUCTED Note SQLite (distributed with Qt) are built in the package using -sql-sqlite Note All builds have -no-icu because I think the ICU library is too big and, in most of the conditions, useless for common users. Note All packages are built using emscripten SDK 1.38.16 as recommended in Qt Wiki. WebAssembly doesn’t support ABI compatibility. You MUST use SDK 1.
